name: event.gevent
title: Global custom events
description: Provides the ability to have a jQuery **collection** subscribe a **function** to a **global custom event**.  This plugin is featured in the book [Single page web applications - JavaScript end-to-end](http://manning.com/mikowski). Methods include **subscribe**, **publish**, and **unsubscribe**. This is similar to jQuery global custom events support which was removed from jQuery 1.9+.
